features: KEEP COLD ALL DAY: The bottle is double-walled and vacuum insulated to keep your drink cold for up to 48 hours (when filled with ice cubes) or hot for up to 24 hours, perfect for those of you who love to drink ice water.

CAPACITY: The 64 oz insulated water bottle has a large capacity that allows you to stay hydrated for a long time without the need to refill frequently. It's perfect for outdoor activities or long trips.
LEAKPROOF: Water bottle insulated lid has a reinforced rubber ring, 360°no matter how hard you shake will not leak.You don't have to worry about it leaking.

EASY TO CARRY : Water bottle 64oz with paracord handle.The paracord handle is a nice touch, as it provides a comfortable and secure grip.You can also attach it to your backpack or bike with a carabiner for added convenience.
WITH 2 LIDS: The 64 oz thermos has a lid with straw and a round mouth lid, you can freely switch the lid according to your needs. Whether you want a straw or without straw it is fine.

DURABILITY: The water bottle is made of high-quality stainless steel that is strong and durable, and can withstand harsh outdoor conditions. It's also resistant to rust, corrosion, and impacts, which means it can last for a long time.

LARGE CAPACITY WATER BOTTLE: 64OZ sports water bottle, whether you are climbing, cycling, or fitness or camping, large capacity water bottle to provide you with enough water. And is available in a variety of cool colors.The best choice for gifts.

CUSTOMER FIRST: If the water bottle is not to your liking, the responsibility is ours. If there are any issues, please give us a chance to help you solve it, contact us, and we will address it until you are satisfied.

Of course, when you don't need the straw, just replace the lid.Easy to carry (with paracord handles).Easy to clean.A variety of cool colors, personalized gifts for men/women.
Only Fill Water Once A Day Now you can actually fit ice cubes it in. When you're out at work or traveling, this large insulated water bottle can meet your daily water needs and keep it cold all day.
When your half gallon water bottle is filled with ice, it will keep cold for 48 hours.

KEEP ICE ALL DAY When you fill it with ice, it can stay cold indoors for 2 days; it can stay cold outdoors for at least 1 day. This way you can drink ice water anytime, whether you are at home or outside.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, well insulated and perfect size
reviews.reviewText: Keeps my water cold all day, love the handle for easy carrying and the colors are pretty too! Perfect to take to work and drink out of all day long.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid product for the price! ( I did get it on sale)
reviews.reviewText: bottle is well made, comes with 2 different drinking tops, 2 straws, and brush. Water stays cold for a long time, and the cord handle is easily removed for washing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE this jug for size & the fact it keeps my water COLD
reviews.reviewText: The Doctor said I have to drink 60 oz. of water a day. I cannot stand water unless it's ICE cold, as in BRAIN FREEZE cold!!! This jug is not only the absolute perfect size but it'll hold ice for up to 2 days! It's big, but the braided lanyard is a great handle. I'm not sure what the carbineer is for but I'm sure I'll figure it out when I want to attach something to it. I also appreciate that it has 2 straws and a cleaning brush so I'll always have a spare when I need it. Cheers! Here's to a LOT of cold water!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Overall I love it!
reviews.reviewText: My old water bottle didn’t get me through the work day. It didn’t hold enough water and the work water doesn’t taste the same and gives me heartburn. So I needed a larger container. I bought this bottle for the easy to drink option and the handle. I love that I can slip it over my arm and carry it with other items in my hands or go hands free. I can easily pour ice into the top and it stays cold all day long. I have tried to finish the full bottle in a day and so far I’ve been unsuccessful, which I like because I know I’m good for a full work day. I also love that this bottle is so big to add stickers to and stickers stick to it well. I have been complimented on the external look of the bottle with the gradual color change but I may still cover it in stickers. I would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Price was good !!
reviews.reviewText: I needed a new one and saw this one thinking it was from iron flask, but it was not !! It has some design flaws and works ok, but not as good as the iron flasks !!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I liked so much
reviews.reviewText: I expected something worse, but they exceeded my expectations for their excellent price. Large, portable, comfortable to drink, it keeps cold like a fridge. I can't be happier with my new bottle. :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Who Needs A Stanley!
reviews.reviewText: This bottle is durable, light weight, and has great thermal capabilities! Save your money and get this bottle!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best, if you don't want to spend $!00
reviews.reviewText: I facilitate an outdoor kindergarten and needed a large durable bottle for hot drinks on cold days. This bottle exceeded my expectations. It kept broth hot for hours, in 20 degree temperatures. It is light and easy to carry, easy to pour into small cups without spilling and one third the price of the top brand. The one shortcoming is the lid gasket to prevent spills is a bit loose, not a tight fitting rubber. I needed to make sure it was exactly in place before tightening the lid, which did make it 100% leak proof. Not sure how long that will last. For the price it is a great product.
